description:
Soma realizes that Erina is facing much harsher tasks than the others. They head to see the organizer of the event to protest. Instead, however, they discover the astonishing truth! In the second round of the final selection, Megumi has to face Asahi and Takumi is up against Erina! The battles begin!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La desesperación de la Lengua de Dios
